SEARCH
Package papplevaa.notepad.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
papplevaa.notepad.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
CallbackHandler
public class Controller extends Object implements CallbackHandler
The Controller class manages the communication between the View and Model in the Notepad application. It implements the CallbackHandler interface to handle user actions and updates from the View.

    Constructs a new Controller with the specified view and model.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(View view, Model model)
      Constructs a new Controller with the specified view and model.
      Parameters:
      view - The view to associate with this controller.
      model - The model to associate with this controller.

  • Method Details

    • loadModel

      public void loadModel()
      Loads the model from the serialized data file and updates the model accordingly. Reads contents of files saved in the model and updates tab information.

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the Notepad application by initializing the view and running it.

    • newTab

      public void newTab()
      Signals the creation of a new tab in the application. Creates a new, empty tab in the Notepad application. Adds the new tab to both the model, and the view. Sets it as the selected tab.
      Specified by:
      newTab in interface CallbackHandler

    • closeTab

      public void closeTab()
      Signals the request to close the currently active tab in the application. Closes the currently active tab in the Notepad application. Checks for unsaved changes, prompts the user to save if necessary, and removes the tab from both the model and view.
      Specified by:
      closeTab in interface CallbackHandler

    • open

      public void open()
      Signals the request to open a file and create a new tab for its content in the application. Opens a file chooser dialog to select a file, creates a new tab with the file's content, and adds it to both the model and view. Sets the newly opened tab as the selected tab.
      Specified by:
      open in interface CallbackHandler

    • save

      public void save()
      Signals the request to save the content of the currently active tab. Saves the content of the currently active tab. If the tab has not been saved before, invokes the saveAs method.
      Specified by:
      save in interface CallbackHandler

    • saveAs

      public void saveAs()
      Signals the request to save the content of the currently active tab with a new file name or location. Opens a file chooser dialog to choose a location to save the content of the currently active tab. Updates the tab's file path, saves the content.
      Specified by:
      saveAs in interface CallbackHandler

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Signals the request to undo the last user action in the currently active tab. Undoes the last user action in the currently active tab using the UndoableTextArea.
      Specified by:
      undo in interface CallbackHandler

    • redo

      public void redo()
      Signals the request to redo the previously undone user action in the currently active tab. Redoes the previously undone user action in the currently active tab using the UndoableTextArea.
      Specified by:
      redo in interface CallbackHandler

    • copy

      public void copy()
      Signals the request to copy the selected content in the currently active tab. Copies the selected content in the currently active tab using the UndoableTextArea.
      Specified by:
      copy in interface CallbackHandler

    • cut

      public void cut()
      Signals the request to cut the selected content in the currently active tab. Cuts the selected content in the currently active tab using the UndoableTextArea.
      Specified by:
      cut in interface CallbackHandler

    • paste

      public void paste()
      Signals the request to paste the copied or cut content in the currently active tab. Pastes the copied or cut content in the currently active tab using the UndoableTextArea.
      Specified by:
      paste in interface CallbackHandler

    • close

      public void close()
      Signals the request to close the Notepad application. Closes the Notepad application, serializes the model, and disposes of the application frame.
      Specified by:
      close in interface CallbackHandler

    • invertTheme

      public void invertTheme()
      Signals the request to invert the theme in the application. Inverts the theme (dark mode to light mode or vice versa) in the Notepad application. Updates both the model and view to reflect the theme change.
      Specified by:
      invertTheme in interface CallbackHandler

    • updateSelectedTab

      public void updateSelectedTab(int selectedIndex)
      Signals the update of the selected tab in the application. Updates the model with the newly selected tab's index.
      Specified by:
      updateSelectedTab in interface CallbackHandler
      Parameters:
      selectedIndex - The index of the newly selected tab.

    • updateContent

      public void updateContent(String newContent)
      Signals the update of the content in the currently active tab with new content. Updates the content of the currently active tab with the provided new content in the model. Updates the title in the view.
      Specified by:
      updateContent in interface CallbackHandler
      Parameters:
      newContent - The new content to update in the active tab.

    • updateFrameSize

      public void updateFrameSize(int width, int height)
      Signals the update of the size of the application window. Updates the size of the Notepad application window with the provided width and height. Updates the model with the new window size.
      Specified by:
      updateFrameSize in interface CallbackHandler
      Parameters:
      width - The new width of the application window.
      height - The new height of the application window.
